description:
What should one do when stranded in the most infamous forest in all of Japan? Have a philosophical discussion about cats.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: In the Sea of Trees Part 1 / In the Sea of Trees Part 2 / Snow White the White Shiba
Jukai nite Zenhan / Jukai nite Kouhan / Shiro Shiba no Shirayuki-san
樹海にて前半 / 樹海にて後半 / 白柴の白雪さん
